alert.note: Alert for Deuel (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:29PM CDT until June 23 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 828 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Julesburg, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Big Springs, Barton and Goldeneye State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 89 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of and southwestern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of and southwestern Nebraska.
